| HistoryText             = The Gideon Trust is a ruthless corporation that acquired the assets of the late [[Gregory Gideon (Earth-616)|Gregory Gideon]], a sometime foe of the [[Fantastic Four (Earth-616)|Fantastic Four]]. When the Fantastic Four were forced to sell some of their assets to the Gideon Trust, the organization then attempted to exploit the [[Negative Zone]]. This plan was thwarted by the Fantastic Four.{{r|Fantastic Four Vol 3 35|44}}
